title: syslog defines Priority LOG_ALERT, but syslog.Writer is missing Alert() function
body:
by **unit0x03**: 
The syslog package (http://golang.org/pkg/syslog/) has functions on Writer defined for
every log priority except Alert.

For consistency's sake, there should be a function with this signature in the syslog
package:

func (w *Writer) Alert(m string) (err os.Error)
